item.description:
http://www.newstimes....

All three candidates in Connecticut's pugilistic Republican Senate primary field are expected to participate in a televised debate the first week of March, including former World Wrestling Entertainment executive Linda McMahon.

The debate has been tentatively scheduled for March 2 at the University of Hartford and is a collaboration between the Hartford Courant and WTIC-TV Fox 61, according to McMahon's campaign, who said the details are still being hashed out.

Event is closed, but I have more tickets to give out, and you can still get them. Contact me if interested!

Be sure to be there by 6:45 as the doors close.
item.name: US Senate Debate - Peter Schiff Takes on the Republican Field!
